intro.title: Wilpattu National Park
intro.subtitle: Whispers of Wilderness: Beyond the Leopards
intro.description: Beyond the golden plains of Sri Lanka lies a land painted in emerald and ochre, where the air echoes with the trumpeting of giants and the whispers of ancient secrets. Wilpattu, a tapestry woven from sun-drenched grasslands, shimmering villus lakes, and whispering forests, promises an unforgettable safari adventure into the heart of Sri Lanka's wilderness.

box1.title: History and Significance
box1.description: Delve into Wilpattu's ancient legacy as a hunting ground for kings, its resilience after facing challenges, and its current status as a vital refuge for Sri Lankan wildlife

box2.title: Landscapes and Ecosystems
box2.description: Paint a vivid picture of Wilpattu's distinctive terrain, characterized by sprawling plains dotted with villus, rocky outcrops, and pockets of dense vegetation that create a mosaic of habitats

box3.title: Biodiversity Highlights
box3.description: Showcase Wilpattu's remarkable biodiversity, with over 300 species of plants, 31 mammals (including leopards, elephants, sloth bears, and deer), 150 bird species, and diverse reptiles and amphibians.

box1.title: Leopards in the Spotlight
box1.description: Emphasize Wilpattu's reputation as a haven for leopards, offering excellent opportunities to witness these elusive predators in their natural habitat.

box2.title: Giants Among the Plains
box2.description: Highlight the awe-inspiring presence of elephants, often spotted roaming the grasslands or gathering around the villus.

box3.title: Avian Abundance
box3.description: Celebrate the park's rich birdlife, including vibrant peacocks, majestic eagles, colorful kingfishers, and numerous water birds that flock to the villus

why.title: Why Choose Sri Lanka for Wildlife?

list.list1: Unparalleled Biodiversity: Encounter a staggering variety of animals, from majestic elephants and elusive leopards to vibrant birds and fascinating reptiles.
list.list2: Authentic Experiences: Immerse yourself in the natural world through jeep safaris, boat trips, guided walks, and local community interactions.
list.list3: Year-Round Destination: Enjoy wildlife encounters throughout the year, with different regions offering unique experiences based on season.
list.list4: Sustainable Tourism: Support responsible tourism practices that benefit both wildlife and local communities.
